answers.answer: Take the test!!! I know those tests are no fun, BUT you need to think about your babies health as well as your own!
If you don't take the test treat yourself like you have gestational diabetes. I personally would bite the bullet and do it just to find out if I have it or not.
Take the test. I failed my one hour but passed the 3 hour. I felt a little sick during the first hour then I was fine.

also, if you refuse the test, your doctor reserves the right to refuse future service to you, as in they can decide not to see you any longer. It is really recommended, the 3 hour test sucked, but I'd rather know whether or not I had gestational diabetes for my child's sake because you are more at risk for having a large baby, and this can result in c-section if they don't induce you earlier. And also, if you do have gestational diabetes and don't control it while you are pregnant, it increases your chances dramatically of having type 2 permanently once you are no longer pregnant.
